title: Episode 184: One Line of Disaster
itunes:title: Episode 184: One Line of Disaster
description:
Bobo loves his comfort pillow. Koloko bought a zoo. Our friend Peter Kim stops by and we talk coming out, sashimi style, ugly fine, and one fat organ.   More Peter on The Ajumma Show

Bonus content every Monday:
